thread.section_title: Hotel Beauchamps - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: a relax after day working
thread.title_full: a relax after day working - Review of Hotel Beauchamps, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: monia_lanzarini
title: a relax after day working
text:
after a very heavy day working is always a plesure to relax on this confortabe hotel.
all the stress really desappear.... person at the hotel are always ready to help you but in a discrete way ... rooms are nice even on the color of the carpet!!! bathroom and shower and the parfume of the bathfoam are so confortable. the breakfast is very righ and good quality .... the viennoiserie is faboulous....
